messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=7bcfc5879223 ***

runtime: revert UseSpanType back to 1

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7812043

LGTM

On Thu, Mar 14, 2013 at 2:48 AM, <dvyukov@google.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://dvyukov%40google.com@**code.google.com/p/go/<http://40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/>
>
>
> Description:
> runtime: revert UseSpanType back to 1
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/7812043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/7812043/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/pkg/runtime/runtime.h
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/runtime/runtime.h
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.h
> +++ b/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.h
> @@ -991,5 +991,5 @@
>
>  enum
>  {
> -       UseSpanType = 0,
> +       UseSpanType = 1,
>  };
>

subject: code review 7812043: runtime: revert UseSpanType back to 1
